attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The large increase in the sales of un licensed and un type approved mini motorcycles, mini motos, go-peds and mini quads and their inappropriate use is leading to considerable problems in some communities. There is a large body of legislation that allows the police and trading standards officers to take appropriate action to curtail the sale and misuse of these vehicles. This legislation should be used rather than another raft of inappropriate and unenforceable legislation introduced.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that the use of mini motorcycles, mini motos, go-peds and mini quads is controlled by the use of the current law pertaining and not by the introduction of new quick fix ill thought out and unenforceable laws."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14153.asp
